name: anglican
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the Church of England, or an international Church connected with it: Desmond Tutu became the most famous Anglican archbishop in South Africa. Outside England, the Anglican Church is often referred to as the Episcopal or Episcopalian Church. an Anglican priest
